name: Enter the Props Room... (a virtual haunted adventure)
name_original: Enter the Props Room... (a virtual haunted adventure)
description:
Enter the props room if you dare...

Hidden in the basement of Glendon college is a room full of mysterious (and sometimes disturbing) objects. We call it the props room, but the room does far more than just store things for the theatre. Step inside and explore, but be careful.

You might not be the only one in there.

(Alteri Productions presents our "haunted house" for Halloween 2021. Based entirely on real items in our props room. In this time of Covid, we can't do an in-person haunted house like we normally would, so we have made this click-and-point virtual adventure instead. Hope you enjoy!)
